name: The Swampies
description:
Poor Swampis! The evil slimes have raided their storehouse and left them without food - and they've had such a hard time gathering it!

Winter is coming and the Swampies aren't going to let those nasty critters leave them without food, so they've set out to break into their lair and take back what's theirs... with your help, of course.

Join one of those brave Swampies on their dangerous mission to recover their precious food and get out of the labyrinthine slime domains in one piece, where you'll have to deal with motley enemies, traps and mechanisms.

MAIN FEATURES:

  • Beautiful and colorful pixel-art graphics.
  • A breath of fresh air for a very retro mechanic? and a lot of fun!
  • Simple controls.
  • Choose the color of your Swampie, you have 5 to choose from!
  • Cute and charismatic characters.
  • Several spectacular display modes that you can switch between at the touch of a button.
  • Lots of traps and mechanisms.
  • Collect gift boxes with power-ups with which you will obtain certain advantages, such as speed, shield, or the ability to create blocks to block the movement of your enemies. But beware, they can also hide deadly traps.
  • High score table.
  • Great soundtrack by the great Kevin McLeod (incompetech.com).
  • Joystick/Gamepad compatible.
